name: Apocalyptic Onslaught
description:
My first ever game and also my submission to Juice Jam II!

The game has you in your safe house where you must venture out and clear the current wave of zombies, before you can come back to base and upgrade your firepower.

Note: After purchasing a new weapon, use your number keys to equip them in the order you bought them.

Unfortunately unfinished due to other time commitments but hope you enjoy regardless.
